DF-QOL.errorLibWrapperMissing: 'DF Quality of Life' requires the 'libWrapper' module. Please install and activate 'libWrapper'.
DRAGON_FLAGON_QOL.QuickRollTitle: Enable Roll Table menu option to quick roll
DRAGON_FLAGON_QOL.QuickRollHint: (Requires reload) Adds a menu option to Roll Tables in the Roll Table sidebar to roll on the table without having to open the table window.
DRAGON_FLAGON_QOL.AutoFocusTitle: Enable Auto-Focusing text field in Entity dialogs
DRAGON_FLAGON_QOL.AutoFocusHint: When creating an Entity (Actors, Items, Tables, Scenes, etc.) this will auto-select the Name text box so you don't have to click it. Just open the dialog and start typing!
DRAGON_FLAGON_QOL.FolderTextColourHint: Add ability to set a custom text colour for entity folders.
DRAGON_FLAGON_QOL.BetterToggleName: Enable Better Scene Control Toggle Highlight
DRAGON_FLAGON_QOL.BetterToggleHint: Changes the scene controls so that when the purple toggle buttons are turned on, it is more visible.
DRAGON_FLAGON_QOL.ReloadGameContent: Some changes made will only go into effect on a reload. Would you like to reload now?
DRAGON_FLAGON_QOL.VehicleUnit_SettingNam: Enable Unit of weight for Vehicles
DRAGON_FLAGON_QOL.VehicleUnit_SettingHin: Enables ability to change the base unit for weight used by vehicles
DRAGON_FLAGON_QOL.VehicleUnit_ConfigHint: Unit of measurement to be used for weight calculation.
DRAGON_FLAGON_QOL.VehicleUnit_ConvertCon: Would you like to convert the current cargo capacity from '{{OLD}}' to '{{NEW}}'?
DRAGON_FLAGON_QOL.DayNightProgress_Setti: When you run the animated Day/Night transition, enabling this will display the progress bar showing the progress from start to finish of the animation.
DRAGON_FLAGON_QOL.DayNightDuration_Setti: The duration of time it takes for the Day/Night transition animation to complete. This is in Seconds (1-60 seconds)
